content: Four+ tool cordless combos Four or more tools cordless combos ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Power tool combo kits ### FEATURES:Features Soft bag with durable and water-resistant ballistic poly-nylon construction Tools designed to increase productivity by delivering corded performance Applications Professional level work on any jobsite All-in-one solution for a set of trade applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3782432 - UG CONSTRUCTION KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 4-22 (03) Cordless rotary hammer - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x SID 6-22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x Belt hook cordless - 1x VC 4LX-22 Dust extractor head - 1x VC 3/4-T8 Tank - 1x Hose 32mm x 3m (9.8 ft) anti-static - 1x Filter VC 4X/140 wet/dry - 1x Dust bag VC 4X-T8/140 (10) plastic - 1x SB 4-22 Band saw - 2x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 1x TE DRS-4/6 (01) USA HEPA Dust removal system - 1x TE DRS-D Dust removal system - 2x B 22-170 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x TE 4/6-22 + DRS 4/6 Tool case assy - 3782430 - SUBSTATION MAINTENANCE KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 6AT-22 03 Cordl. imp. wrench - 1x SR 6-22 (02) Cordl. reciprocating saw - 1x SID 6-22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x Belt hook cordless - 1x SF 6H-22 03 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x AG 6D-22-6 Cordl. angle grinder - 1x Wrench - 1x Outer Flange - 1x 5/8 D45 Flange inside - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x 150 Protective cover assy - 1x 150 Clip-on front cover - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 3x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Kwik lock 5/8 - 11 - 1x Tool bag medium - 3642536 - Cordl. reciprocating saw SR 2-A12 BULK - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SR 2-A12 Cordl. reciprocating saw - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x SFD 2-A12 Cordl. drill driver - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 3x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 1x SL 2-A12 Cordl. lamp - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - 1x Magnet holder SL 2 cordless - 1x Tool bag medium - 3603988 - 12V 4-Tool Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SR 2-A12 Cordl. reciprocating saw - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 4x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 1x SL 2-A12 Cordl. lamp - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Magnet holder SL 2 cordless - 1x S Soft Pouch - 3578526 - SF 2H-A, SID 2-A, SFD 2-A & SL 2-A12 Tas - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x SFD 2-A12 Cordl. drill driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 3x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x SL 2-A12 Cordl. lamp - 1x Magnet holder SL 2 cordless - 1x S Soft Pouch
